data.trans: Xác định, tìm hiểu chắc chắn
data.trans_hint: Họ phải tìm hiểu chắc chắn xem mảnh đất có còn thuộc sở hữu chính phủ hay không.
data.en_hint: They must ascertain if the land is still owned by the government.
data.content_game_1: They must ascertain if the land is still owned by the government.
data.answer_en_hint: They must ascertain if the land is still owned by the government.

data.trans_hint: Các sản phẩm phù hợp với môi trường sẽ tối thiểu các tác hại lên môi trường.
data.en_hint: Environmentally compatible products minimize the adverse effects on the environment.
data.content_game_1: Environmentally compatible products minimize the adverse effects on the environment.
data.answer_en_hint: Environmentally compatible products minimize the adverse effects on the environment.

data.trans_hint: Sau khi kết hôn, họ định cư tại Brooklyn.
data.en_hint: After they got married, they settled in Brooklyn.
data.content_game_1: After they got married, they settled in Brooklyn.
data.answer_en_hint: After they got married, they settled in Brooklyn.

data.trans_hint: Bọn trẻ đã làm tôi điên cuồng cả ngày!
data.en_hint: The children have been driving me frantic all day!
data.content_game_1: The children have been driving me frantic all day!
data.answer_en_hint: The children have been driving me frantic all day!

data.trans: Cổ xưa, quá hạn, đã lỗi thời
data.trans_hint: Đèn khí ga đã trở nên lỗi thời khi đèn điện được phát minh.
data.en_hint: Gas lamps became obsolete when electric lighting was invented.
data.content_game_1: Gas lamps became obsolete when electric lighting was invented.
data.answer_en_hint: Gas lamps became obsolete when electric lighting was invented.

data.trans_hint: Thế giới có quá đông dân số không?
data.content_game_1: Is the world overpopulated?
data.answer_en_hint: Is the world overpopulated?

data.trans_hint: Đó là một căn phòng được trang bị nội thất thưa thớt.
data.en_hint: That is a sparsely furnished room.
data.content_game_1: That is a sparsely furnished room.
data.answer_en_hint: That is a sparsely furnished room.

data.trans: Yên tĩnh, yên bình, lặng lẽ, không bị quấy rầy, thanh bình
data.trans_hint: Anh nhìn chằm chằm vào mặt hồ tĩnh lặng.
data.en_hint: He stared at the tranquil surface of the lake.
data.content_game_1: He stared at the tranquil surface of the lake.
data.answer_en_hint: He stared at the tranquil surface of the lake.

data.trans: Dịch vụ công cộng (ví dụ điện, nước), công ty cung cấp dịch vụ
data.trans_hint: Chúng tôi là một công ty cung cấp ga thiên nhiên phục vụ hàng triệu khách hàng ở khu vực Michigan.
data.en_hint: We are a natural gas utility serving over a million customers in the Michigan area.
data.content_game_1: We are a natural gas utility serving over a million customers in the Michigan area.
data.answer_en_hint: We are a natural gas utility serving over a million customers in the Michigan area.
